Changes
*******

3.0.0 (2018-01-05)
==================

- Python 3 compatibility.

- Fix view_lookup test.

1.2.1 (2016-02-15)
==================

- Update tests.

1.2 (2012-05-01)
================

- Use update grokcore.component api.

1.1 (2011-01-02)
================

- Fixed setup.py namespace issue.

1.0 (2010-11-03)
================

- Factored out of the ``grok`` package.
